mapper.insert: insert into msghelper.material_lib_group (group_name, create_type, create_time, update_time, material_lib_id,status) VALUES (#{groupName},#{createType},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{materialLibId},#{status})
mapper.update:
update msghelper.material_lib_group
group_name=#{groupName},
update_time=#{updateTime},
status=#{status},
id=#{id}
